definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing

sentences.english: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，亲爱的，我不管你屁事。

sentences.english: You know this really doesn't concern you.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，这根本不关你屁事。

sentences.english: Chinese people are honest , they never lie .
sentences.chinese: 挖勒，你不要骗我就好了，干中国人啥屁事。

sentences.english: Saw once more while convenient your subject, you have been oppressive , closes our trifling thing?
sentences.chinese: 顺便再次看到了你的主题，你被虐了，关我们屁事？

sentences.english: You shouldn't get so pissed off about trivial shit.
sentences.chinese: 你不该为这么点屁事而生这么大的气。

sentences.english: Your whole fucking life for a fucking fuck.
sentences.chinese: 你整个的生命竟浪费在这等屁事上。

definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond
to look for employment/to pick a quarrel
